CAREER SUMMARY  
 
March 2020 to date Samsung Engineering  
Position: HR Business Partner (MEAN Region ) 
• Leading entire  scope of the implementation strategy of Emiratization in 
accordance with the organizations' overall goals and objectives.  
• Coordinate with head of departments and leaders for National Development 
Program of UAE national within offices and project sites i ncluding training 
program.  
• Network with relevant Government Authorities and be aware of Government 
regulations  
• Reviewing and updating HR policy in accordance with new regulation and 
ensure the best practice of the policy at office and in project sites.  
• Proposing and take HR initiatives in line with business objectives at different 
project sites in MENA region with action plan & timeline (recruitment, talent 
acquisition management, GPMS  
• Optimizing HR design to increase productivity and improve perfor mance of 
team members  
• Providing support to HR / Site Admin through partnership with managers and 
part leaders  
• Cooperate closely with HR /Site admin to meet their goals & initiatives  
• Guide and communicate overall company HR strategy at project sites i n MENA 
region  
    
• Collaborate with HR, Admin site to consult on HR issues and initiatives  
• Developing HR initiatives & operational strategy that effect performance 
improve at project sites in MENA region.  
• Suggest initiatives to develop the functioning of HR / Site Admin at different 
project sites.  
• Implementation of HR operational management strategy (UAE, SAUDI, OMAN, 
and ALGERIA)  
• Providing or suggesting team performance improve that support growth and 
chance in line with company objectives  
• Work with HR Teams in MENA region to develop HR operational strategy in 
line with Bus iness Strategy  
• Improve HR analysis and metrics or Dashboard  
• Managing implementation & development of HR information systems (AI Smart 
ATS Solution, HR operational & Management system)  
• Helping company to be future ready by focusing on latest technolog y (Artificial 
intelligence, ERP)  
• Provide guidance on the creation and implementation of HR processes align 
with existing systems and solutions at project sites  
• Collaborating with HR team members at different project sites on 
implementation innovative &  inclusive HR operational strategies  
• Improve workplace relationships, and boost productivity and retention in HR 
department  
 
April 2017 to May 2018 General Electric Power  
Position: HR M anager (Algeria, Egypt & South A frica)  
 
HR Management  
• Recruiting & Staffing  
• Organizational planning for other departments  
• Staff motivation & Control  
• Employee onboarding, needed assessment and training,  
• Employment & compliance to regularity concerns regarding  employees  
• Coordination with public authorities,  
• Health, Safety & Insurance of manpower  
• Personal ongoing development,  
• Payroll, compensation, and benefit  
 
HR Development  
• Develop solutions, programs, procedures, guidelines, to help and assist the 
employees with the strategic goals of company  
• Continuous stu dy of all Human Resources policies, programs, and their 
application on the field  
• Leads the development of each department goals, objectives  
 
Human Resources information systems (data)  
• Data management on company’s website, HR section, information  
• Using OneHR, OHR, IDM , PM systems to speed -up tasks, empower 
employees, meet the other needs of the organization
